classes.name: Invoice
classes.description: Financial invoices, bills, receipts, and billing documents containing payment information, amounts, dates, vendor details, and transaction records.

classes.name: Technical Manual
classes.description: Technical documentation, user guides, instruction manuals, API documentation, and how-to documents with procedures, specifications, and technical details.

classes.name: Legal Contract
classes.description: Legal agreements, contracts, terms of service, privacy policies, licensing agreements, and regulatory compliance documents with legal terms and conditions.

classes.name: Business Report
classes.description: Business reports, financial statements, analytics reports, quarterly reports, and corporate communications containing data, insights, and business metrics.

classes.name: Research Paper
classes.description: Academic papers, research studies, white papers, scientific publications, and scholarly articles with research findings, methodologies, and citations.

classes.name: Marketing Material
classes.description: Promotional content, brochures, advertisements, marketing communications, product catalogs, and sales materials designed to promote products or services.
